## Maximum Adverse Excursion {.tabset}

Largest loss in an open trade

```{r mae}
src <- map(
  .x = sort(symbols), 
  .f = function(x) {
    knitr::knit_expand(
      file = here::here("./children/child_maximum_adverse_excursion.Rmd"), 
      symbol = x
    )
  }
)
```

`r knitr::knit(text = unlist(src))`

## Maximum Favorable Excursion {.tabset}
